42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Umar said:We used to say in the times of the Prophet (ﷺ): We do not compare anyone with Abu Bakr. ’Umar came next and then ‘Uthman. We then would leave (rest of) the companions of the Prophet (ﷺ) without treating any as superior to other

chapter.eng-name: Order Of The Companions In Respect Of Merit
